channel.title: Comments on: No Downtime Part Two

item.title: By: Keystone
item.dc:creator: Keystone
item.description:
Heather,
I thought your typo of "major bus" was referring to a 'short bus' of some type; hence a major short bus would mean... well you gett he idea!
item.content:encoded:
Heather,

I thought your typo of “major bus” was referring to a ‘short bus’ of some type; hence a major short bus would mean… well you gett he idea!

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: Naturally, that should have been, "major bugs". I'm not sure what it would mean for a "major bus" to crop up, but I suppose it would be entertaining...
item.content:encoded: Naturally, that should have been, “major bugs”. I’m not sure what it would mean for a “major bus” to crop up, but I suppose it would be entertaining…

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: I'm counting on the latter at this point. As it is I could barely play today... I kept getting booted or kept out due to bugs from the pre-launch patch. I can't imagine they're ready for the expansion with this number of major bus still cropping up.
item.content:encoded: I’m counting on the latter at this point. As it is I could barely play today… I kept getting booted or kept out due to bugs from the pre-launch patch. I can’t imagine they’re ready for the expansion with this number of major bus still cropping up.
